messages.subject: Unschooler's Waterpark Gathering
messages.msgSnippet: There is only one month left to receive the early bird specials from Kalahari Waterpark Resort when you reserve your room for the Unschoolers Waterpark
messages.messageBody:
There is only one month left to receive the early bird specials from Kalahari Waterpark Resort when you reserve your room for the Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering! UWG is February 3rd to the 8th, 2013 at the Kalahari Waterpark in Sandusky, Ohio. Our keynote speaker this year is David Albert. We have a full schedule of speakers, funshops and events planned for the coming event as well. Please visit our website for more information, event registration and schedules.

www.unschoolerswaterparkgathering.com

Hope to see you all in February!

Kim Lowery
Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering
2013 Main Events Coordinator

messages.subject: Unschooler's Waterpark Gathering
messages.msgSnippet: Registration is now open for the 6th Annual Unschooler s Waterpark Gathering at the Kalahari Resort in Sandusky, Ohio.  Our gatherings are for unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Registration is now open for the 6th Annual Unschooler's Waterpark Gathering at the Kalahari Resort in Sandusky, Ohio. Our gatherings are for unschooling families from around the country to meet up as a community, share their experiences, have fun, relax and enjoy the waterpark together! Registration is only $35 per family. Please check out the website for information about speakers, funshops, main events and more! www.unschoolerswaterparkgathering.com The Kalahari Resort also offers an earlybird registration package consisting of a $20 gift card, $20 arcade card and mini golf passes for registering before October 1st.

Hope to see you there!

Kim Lowery
UWG Main Events Coordinator
